title: World map tile service: New Lion's Arch

comments.author: Elrey.5472
comments.body: Be careful, Lawton, we do know how watches end (If you follow GoT at least haha).

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body:
Reincarnated.1754:

whisper Verdant Brinks, could there be more that could slip out?

Not on my watch!

comments.author: Reincarnated.1754
comments.body:
Lawton Campbell.8517:

Probably not anytime soon; we’ve had a lot of issues with it.

coughs at Verdant Brink

That’s a shame, running around Lion’s Arch with the old Lion’s Arch on my other monitor is so disorientating.

How about a temporary floor of just the new Lion’s Arch until things get fully sorted?
That way no other maps should slip in

whisper Verdant Brinks, could there be more that could slip out?

comments.author: Crise.9401
comments.body:
Lawton Campbell.8517:

Probably not anytime soon; we’ve had a lot of issues with it.

coughs at Verdant Brink

I am sure people wouldn’t mind… it’s just us few here no one has to know if that were to happen again. You can always point at the people who decided betas should share the same client space as the live game although it has some unexpected benef… erm unfortunate side-effects for some of us.

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body:
Probably not anytime soon; we’ve had a lot of issues with it.

coughs at Verdant Brink

comments.author: Drant.5902
comments.body:
Will the rebuilt Lion’s Arch map tiles be added/updated? Currently the tiles are the old ruined LA with Scarlet debris.

https://tiles.guildwars2.com/1/1/7/63/58.jpg
